items.name: case connect
items.desc: Start the VPN connection for every connection attempt.

items.name: case disconnect
items.desc: Do not start the VPN connection, and disconnect the VPN connection if it is not currently disconnected.

items.name: case evaluateConnection
items.desc: Start the VPN after evaluating the destination host being accessed against the rule's parameters.

items.name: case ignore
items.desc: Do not start the VPN connection, but do not disconnect it if it is currently connected.
